titleStmt.title: An epitaph, or rather a short discourse made vpon the life [and] death of D. Boner sometimes vnworthy Bisshop of London whiche dyed the v. of September in the Marshalsie.
titleStmt.author: Knell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Church in the Pultrie by Iohn Allde,

notesStmt.note: Signed at ed: T. Knell. Iu.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the long shop adioyning vnto S. Mildreds Church in the Pultrie
